attributes.action: adopt Australian policy on immigrant crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Adopt Australian policy on immigrant crime, revoke Visa’s or right to live in UK of immigrants who break the law (however minor) or pose a threat to British society and well being.
Get tough with a new 'no if's no but's' deportation policy for immigrant criminals found guilty of crime.
